snippet: The Spring Studio in Manhattan, now surrounded by luxury residences and stores, has been a place for drawers to sketch live models since 1994. Its lease will expire in mid-December.
abstract: Grace Notes column; Spring Studio, cluttered drawing studio that evokes SoHo's more bohemian days, will be forced to leave its Spring Street location when its lease runs out in December; studio's owner Minerva Durham, who charges studio's devotees low prices for life-drawing sessions, is looking for guarantor on new space.
lead_paragraph: The Spring Studio in Manhattan, now surrounded by luxury residences and stores, has been a place for drawers to sketch live models since 1994. Its lease will expire in mid-December.

headline.print_headline: SoHo Artist’s Studio, a Space Detached From Time, Is Forced to Move
headline.main: SoHo Artist’s Studio, a Space Detached From Time, Is Forced to Move
